tool.help:
Documentation For documentation on the tool see https://github.com/matchms/matchms/blob/master/README.rst or for more details https://matchms.readthedocs.io/en/latest/.
Upstream Tools +-----------+---------------+--------+-----------+ | Name | Output File | Format | Parameter | +===========+===============+========+===========+ | RAMClustR | Mass spectra | msp | references| +-----------+---------------+--------+-----------+ | RAMClustR | Mass spectra | msp | queries | +-----------+---------------+--------+-----------+
RAMClustR outputs a collection of **msp** files which can be matched to a library (.msp) using a similarity score computed in matchMS.
Downstream Tools The **output** is a csv which contains the similarity score and the number of matched peaks as a tuple.
